title: Kanata: The Supervisor of Sleep!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Morning~. Oooh, Kanata is the first one here today~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Good morning, Kanata.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Tch~, you were here, huh, Mia-chan.... Hm? You don’t look so good, are you okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Ah, I’m fine. I was just a little occupied with composing work.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Did you.... stay up all night?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Yeah.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eeeh~! That’s not good, you shouldn’t do that! You need to get some sleep, even if it’s just for a little bit!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>No, I’m used to not sleeping to write songs. 1 day is nothing. I’m not even sleepy at all right now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>That’s just because of adrenaline. As a lover of sleep, Kanata can’t overlook this~! Come on, come over here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>God, you’re annoying.... Alright, I’m here, what am I-.... Wait, uwaaah!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>You’re sentenced to endure my lap pillow! You don’t have to sleep, just close your eyes!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>W-, what are you... trying to.... zzz....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>There, there, you did a great job working up all night.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
